CampaignCard.infoDescription: Share the information with players to start the game.

CampaignDeleteZone.deleteCampaignDescription: Deleting a campaign will also delete all chapters, sections, handouts and images. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete?
CampaignDeleteZone.description: After deleting the campaign, all handouts, images, etc. will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
CampaignDeleteZone.errorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the campaign. Please try again later.
CampaignDeleteZone.idMismatchError: The entered ID does not match
CampaignDeleteZone.inputLabel: Enter the campaign ID to confirm deletion
CampaignDeleteZone.successDescription: Your campaign has been successfully deleted. You now have room to create more campaigns.

CampaignPage.alert: During the testing period, each user can only create 1 campaign. If you want to create more campaigns at this time, please contact the author.
CampaignPage.createCampaign: You can create a new campaign.

ChapterCard.deleteChapterDescription: Deleting a chapter will also delete all sections and handouts in the chapter. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete?

LocaleLayout.description: A simple tool to help you share and manage handouts of RPG campaigns. Developed by WeiHung.

ResetPassword.passwordRequired: Password and confirm password are required.

RuleDeleteZone.deleteRuleDescription: Deleting a rule will also delete all content associated with it. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete?
